snippet: Every month or so, the city’s ambassadors are pitching downtown Phoenix to young entrepreneurs frustrated by the high cost of doing business in Silicon Valley.
abstract: Phoenix officials hope to revitalize oft-maligned city, which was ravaged when housing bubble burst, by developing its neglected downtown; raise sales tax and give builders incentives in effort to lure students, start-ups and small businesses to district.
lead_paragraph: Every month or so, the city’s ambassadors are pitching downtown Phoenix to young entrepreneurs frustrated by the high cost of doing business in Silicon Valley.

headline.main: Phoenix Focuses on Rebuilding Downtown, Wooing Silicon Valley
headline.print_headline: Phoenix Rebuilds Downtown as It Woos Silicon Valley,  but Skeptics Fear Bust
